title: Book a One-Way Flight
description: A traveler needs to book a one-way flight from New York (JFK) to Los Angeles (LAX).

tasks.description: Search for available one-way flights from JFK to LAX on the specified date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent returns a list of available flights with times and prices.

tasks.description: Select the flight chosen by the customer and confirm the total price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the selection and total cost.

tasks.description: Complete the booking with the traveler's details and issue the e-ticket.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the flight and provides a booking reference.
